name: Ultimate Practice Course on Mathematics for JEE 2022
description: In this course, Vineet Loomba will provide in-depth knowledge of various topics in Mathematics. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for JEE Mains & Advanced. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: 12th JEE Practice Session - Part II & Doubt Clearing Session
11th JEE Practice Session - Part III & Doubt Clearing Session

author.bio: A game-changer in Mathematics, produced 100 percentilers in 2021/2022/2023, his courses are regarded as the Benchmark for IIT JEE aspirants.
